item.title: New Mods Added - September 2024
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zootopie)
item.dc:creator: Zootopie
item.content:encoded:
New mods have been added to enhance your gaming experience:

  • Lunar-forge-1.20.1-0.2.0.jar (86 KB - 03/09/2024 12:34:25) - Adds lunar-themed features to your game.
  • MobCaptains-v3.1.2.jar (143 KB - 03/09/2024 12:21:31) - Introduces new mob captains with unique abilities.
  • appleskin-forge-mc1.20.1-2.5.1.jar (47 KB - 03/09/2024 11:35:06) - Displays detailed hunger and saturation values.
  • bettercombat-forge-1.8.6+1.20.1.jar (1026 KB - 03/09/2024 12:46:54) - Enhances combat mechanics for a more immersive experience.
  • deeperdarker-forge-1.20.1-1.3.1.jar (17426 KB - 03/09/2024 11:45:32) - Expands the game with darker and deeper dimensions.
  • endermanoverhaul-forge-1.20.1-1.0.4.jar (1180 KB - 03/09/2024 12:05:49) - Overhauls Enderman behavior and appearance.
  • player-animation-lib-forge-1.0.2-rc1+1.20.jar (178 KB - 03/09/2024 12:58:28) - Adds new player animations for a more dynamic experience.
  • the_bumblezone-7.4.18+1.20.1-forge.jar (51018 KB - 03/09/2024 12:51:46) - Introduces a new dimension filled with bees and honey-themed content.

Stay tuned for more updates in the future!

item.title: New Mods Added - September 2024
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zootopie)
item.dc:creator: Zootopie
item.content:encoded:
New mods have been added to enhance your gaming experience:

  • Anomaly-1.1.2.jar (2237 KB - 01/09/2024 14:22:37) - Adds new anomalies that challenge your survival skills.
  • FarmersDelight-1.20.1-1.2.4.jar (2848 KB - 02/09/2024 15:26:33) - Expands the farming system with new crops, tools, and cooking recipes.
  • automodpack-mc1.20.1-forge-4.0.0-beta16.jar (4576 KB - 02/09/2024 14:24:26) - Automatically installs and manages mods for easier modding.
  • balm-forge-1.20.1-7.3.9-all.jar (365 KB - 02/09/2024 15:25:48) - A backend library for mod developers.
  • cuisinedelight-1.1.14.jar (825 KB - 02/09/2024 13:43:46) - Adds a variety of new culinary delights to the game.
  • dark-waters-connector-1.20.1-0.0.22.jar (4472 KB - 02/09/2024 14:13:42) - Enhances underwater exploration with new biomes and creatures.
  • fishingoverhaul-1.20.1-1.0.0.jar (29 KB - 02/09/2024 13:40:21) - Revamps the fishing system with new fish, mechanics, and items.
  • mcef-forge-2.1.4-1.20.1.jar (211 KB - 02/09/2024 11:34:07) - Browser library that allows for web-based interfaces within the game.
  • naturalist-forge-4.0.3-1.20.1.jar (3265 KB - 02/09/2024 14:05:22) - Introduces wildlife and ecosystems, enriching the natural world.
  • netherportalfix-forge-1.20-13.0.1.jar (213 KB - 02/09/2024 14:15:47) - Fixes issues with Nether portals linking incorrectly.
  • skinlayers3d-forge-1.6.7-mc1.20.1.jar (467 KB - 02/09/2024 15:09:00) - Adds 3D skin layers for a more detailed character appearance.
  • waterframes-FORGE-mc1.20.1-v2.1.3.jar (209 KB - 02/09/2024 12:43:16) - Adds water-themed frames for creative building.
  • watut-forge-1.20.1-1.1.3.jar (345 KB - 02/09/2024 14:21:38) - Adds unique utility tools for automation and efficiency.
  • webdisplays-2.0.1-1.20.1.jar (762 KB - 02/09/2024 11:31:25) - Brings web browsing to your in-game experience with web displays.

Removed mod:

  • origins-forge-1.20.1-1.10.0.9-all.jar (22254 KB - 30/08/2024 23:19:58) - This mod has been removed due to compatibility issues.

Stay tuned for more updates in the future!

item.title: Luscious Lunary Furry - Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Zootopie)
item.dc:creator: Zootopie
item.content:encoded:
Mise à jour des mods et options du jeu :

Rajouts des mods suivants :

  • Mekanism-1.20.1-10.4.9.61.jar (12260 KB - 30/08/2024 00:25:14)
  • Orva Alarms V4.0.0 - 1.20.1.jar (3525 KB - 30/08/2024 01:09:18)
  • YouDied-1.20-3.0.0.17-forge.jar (283 KB - 30/08/2024 00:54:22)
  • additional_lights-1.20.1-2.1.7.jar (518 KB - 30/08/2024 00:33:42)
  • cant_sleep_clowns_will_eat_me-1.20.1-1.1.0.1.jar (11 KB - 30/08/2024 00:14:20)
  • cave_dweller-1.20.1-1.6.4.jar (623 KB - 30/08/2024 00:35:55)
  • twilightforest-1.20.1-4.3.2508-universal.jar (22786 KB - 30/08/2024 23:19:58)
  • caelus-forge-3.1.0+1.20.jar (3854 KB - 30/08/2024 23:19:58)
  • origins-forge-1.20.1-1.10.0.9-all.jar (22254 KB - 30/08/2024 23:19:58)

Suppression de ces mods :

  • ThirstWasTaken-1.20.1-1.3.9.jar (203 KB - 26/08/2024 23:30:33)
  • born_in_chaos_[Forge]1.20.1_1.3.1.jar (11260 KB - 26/08/2024 23:30:36)

Restez à l'écoute pour plus de mises à jour dans le futur !!
